departmentPage.title: Operation Theaters
departmentPage.description: The operating room contains six modern suites equipped with the latest devices, tools, and endoscopic surgical instruments, in addition to a recovery room. It is managed by a team of specialist doctors and supporting staff and operates 24 hours a day.

accordion.Q: What should I expect during my surgery?

departmentPage.title: emergency
departmentPage.description: The Emergency Department consists of eight beds and a distinguished nursing staff. It receives cases in the following specialties: gynecology, pediatrics, internal medicine, cardiology, kidney and urinary tract surgery, and general surgery. The department operates 24 hours a day.

departmentPage.title: laboratory
departmentPage.description: Facilities and processes dedicated to conducting experiments and testing, ensuring accurate results and adherence to scientific standards.

departmentPage.title: radiological department
departmentPage.description: The Diagnostic Medical Imaging Department offers a comprehensive range of diagnostic services to ensure the delivery of the best healthcare.

devices.name: CT Scanner
devices.details: The CT scanner department uses the latest computed tomography imaging techniques to provide accurate, high-quality images of the body's internal organs. This device is used to diagnose a variety of medical conditions, including cancer, injuries, and internal disorders.

devices.name: X-ray
devices.details: The X-ray department provides X-ray imaging services to diagnose medical conditions by delivering clear images of bones and internal tissues. This technique is widely used to detect fractures, infections, and any other abnormalities that may be present.

devices.name: Ultrasound
devices.details: The ultrasound department uses ultrasonic waves to provide accurate imaging of internal organs and soft tissues. This technique is non-invasive and safe, and it is particularly useful for monitoring pregnancies, diagnosing heart conditions, and analyzing gastrointestinal issues.

devices.name: Mobile X-ray Unit
devices.details: We have a mobile X-ray unit available to provide imaging services in various locations within the hospital or clinic. This device facilitates imaging for patients who are difficult to move to the X-ray department, thereby enhancing comfort and saving time.

departmentPage.title: Consultaion Clinics
departmentPage.description: A range of specialized clinics is available, including: gynecology and obstetrics, general surgery with endoscopic techniques, dermatology and venereology, infertility, cosmetic and laser skin surgery, urological surgery and endoscopy, oral and dental medicine and surgery, pediatrics, rheumatology and spinal pain and paralysis, cardiology and internal medicine, general surgery, endoscopic surgery, breast and endocrine surgery, gastrointestinal surgery, and orthopedic and fracture surgery.

departmentPage.title: ICU
departmentPage.description: The Intensive Care Unit contains 5 beds equipped with the latest systems and devices. It is managed by a team of specialist doctors and distinguished medical and support staff, operating 24 hours a day.

departmentPage.title: Normal delivery
departmentPage.description: The natural delivery room features two delivery rooms equipped with the latest delivery beds. It also includes an incubator equipped with state-of-the-art devices. The unit is overseen by a specialist in obstetrics and gynecology, supported by an exceptional nursing team and a licensed midwife, and operates 24 hours a day.

departmentPage.title: Premature babies
departmentPage.description: The Neonatal Unit consists of three incubators and one capsule, managed by a distinguished team of pediatricians and experienced nursing staff. It operates 24 hours a day.

departmentPage.title: Pharmacy
departmentPage.description: All types of medications and medical supplies are available and the service operates 24 hours a day.

departmentPage.title: Room
departmentPage.description: Our patient rooms offer luxurious and comfortable hotel-like services, equipped with the latest beds and amenities to ensure patient comfort. The rooms provide a peaceful and comfortable environment with meticulous attention to detail, enhancing the stay experience
departmentPage.floor: First, Second, Third and Fourth Floor

departmentPage.title: Restaurant
departmentPage.description: A fully equipped dining hall is available for all staff and visitors, managed by a skilled chef.

accordionHeader.title: Frequently Asked Questions
accordionHeader.description: Some of the most frequently asked questions

homeAccordion.Q: What types of services does the hospital offer?
homeAccordion.A: Our hospital offers a wide range of services including emergency care, inpatient and outpatient care, diagnostic imaging, surgical procedures, and specialized services such as cardiology, orthopedics, and oncology.

homeAccordion.Q: What are the hospital's visiting hours?
homeAccordion.A: Visiting hours are typically from 9 AM to 8 PM daily. However, specific hours may vary by department or unit. Please check with the hospital's front desk for detailed information.

homeAccordion.Q: How can I make an appointment with a specialist?
homeAccordion.A: To make an appointment with a specialist, you can call our appointment center at (123) 456-7890 or visit our website and use the online appointment scheduling tool. You may need a referral from your primary care physician.

homeAccordion.Q: What should I bring to my first visit?
homeAccordion.A: For your first visit, please bring a valid ID, your insurance card, any relevant medical records, and a list of current medications. If you have a referral from another doctor, please bring that as well.

homeAccordion.Q: Does the hospital have a pharmacy on-site?
homeAccordion.A: Yes, our hospital has an on-site pharmacy that provides medications to patients. The pharmacy is open from 8 AM to 6 PM on weekdays and 9 AM to 1 PM on weekends.

contactUsHeader.title: We're Here to Help
contactUsHeader.description: Need support or have inquiries? Contact us anytime.
